alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 1:52PM MDT until July 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and southeast Colorado, including the following areas, in east central Colorado, El Paso County. In southeast Colorado, Crowley, Kiowa, Otero, Prowers, and Bent Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong thunderstorms will develop over the area this afternoon and spread eastward towards the Kansas border. Very heavy rainfall rates of up to 3 inches per hour will be possible which may cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
